Review Name: Highly recommended Review Description: Works fine,but lack features compaired to lg split ac model. But overall good one. I use wifi all time Sleep mode save lot of energy and runs the unit as low as 100 watts Fan mode is good,i. Use this fan mode after 2 h of ac running,uses 110 watts . Lot to say,no time If u can get an split ac go for it,if u purely want an window ac then go for it.
